57N.F.summary: Dotz Nano Limited, a technology company, develops and commercializes graphene quantum dots for use in tracing, anti-counterfeiting, and product-liability applications. It provides ValiDotz, BioDotz, Fluorensic, and InSpec solutions for use in crude oil and gas, agrochemicals tagging, polymer tagging, bioimaging, DEF, lubricant, frac fluids tracing, and print and package industry segments. The company sells its products through distributors in North America, Europe, Japan, China, and Australia. It has scientific collaborations and partnerships with various academic institutes. Dotz Nano Limited is headquartered in Petah Tikva, Israel.

AMRK.TA.long_name: Amir Marketing and Investments in Agriculture Ltd.
AMRK.TA.summary: Amir Marketing and Investments in Agriculture Ltd. engages in the business of agricultural products for private farmers in Israel. It is involved in the sale, service, storage, and transportation of agricultural products, such as pesticides, fertilizers, packaging products, technical equipment, animal feed, greenhouse covers, shears, tools, and irrigation equipment for agriculture and gardening. The company also produces animal food mixes for cattle, goats, sheep, poultry, and geese. In addition, it rents commercial properties. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Hefer, Israel.

BRND.TA.summary: Brand Industries Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides metal industry solutions for the infrastructure, energy, and security markets in Israel. The company offers range of products and services for power plants, specialized equipment, and power distribution elements; large-scale plants and infrastructure; and high-rise and complex buildings. It also designs and manufactures LPG and petrol pressure tanks, and pressurized air tanks; and tankers, aircraft refuelers, firefighting trucks, armored vehicles, and special purpose trailers, as well as provides site erection, installation, and logistical services. In addition, the company undertakes turnkey natural gas projects; large scale projects in the industrial, energy, and infrastructure related fields; and erects power plants, large steel structures, bridges, tanks, and pressure vessels. It serves industrial, energy, and security companies; and government agencies. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Yeruham, Israel.

DTZ.AX.summary: Dotz Nano Limited, a technology company, develops and commercializes graphene quantum dots for use in tracing, anti-counterfeiting, and product-liability applications. It provides ValiDotz, BioDotz, Fluorensic, and InSpec solutions for use in crude oil and gas, agrochemicals tagging, polymer tagging, bioimaging, DEF, lubricant, frac fluids tracing, and print and package industry segments. The company sells its products through distributors in North America, Europe, Japan, China, and Australia. It has scientific collaborations and partnerships with various academic institutes. Dotz Nano Limited is headquartered in Petah Tikva, Israel.

GAGR.TA.summary: Gaon Group Ltd. produces and sells pipes, valves, hydrants, and accessories in Israel. The company offers steel and plastic pipes, as well as structural pipes for water, sewerage, oil and gas, and construction industries. It also provides low pressure valves comprising butterfly, gate, diaphragm, and check valves and stariners for water and wastewater, chemicals, firefighting, air conditioning, desalination, and agriculture applications; and water metering solutions. In addition, the company engages in the hot dip galvanization of steel items; and manufacture of household and infrastructure piping, ducts, and profiles. Further, it offers ball-type faucets and fixtures. The company was formerly known as Middle East Tube Company Ltd. and changed its name to Gaon Group Ltd. in March 2017. The company was founded in 1951 and is based in Or Yehuda, Israel. Gaon Group Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of B. Gaon Holdings Ltd.

HAIPF.summary: Hadera Paper Ltd., through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells writing and printing paper, packaging paper, cardboard and corrugated boards, and recycled paper products in Israel and internationally. It provides collection and recycling services for wastepaper, cardboard and plastic waste, electronic waste, and other recyclable materials; and offers cardboard packaging solutions for the food, cosmetics, pharmaceutics, textile, high-tech, games, plastic, and metal products. The company also offers office supplies, paper and paper products, technology and peripherals, hobbies and crafts, furniture, food, and cleaning products. The company was formerly known as American Israeli Paper Mills Ltd. and changed its name to Hadera Paper Ltd. in July 2008. Hadera Paper Ltd. was incorporated in 1951 and is based in Hadera, Israel.

HAP.TA.summary: Hadera Paper Ltd., through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells writing and printing paper, packaging paper, cardboard and corrugated boards, and recycled paper products in Israel and internationally. It provides collection and recycling services for wastepaper, cardboard and plastic waste, electronic waste, and other recyclable materials; and offers cardboard packaging solutions for the food, cosmetics, pharmaceutics, textile, high-tech, games, plastic, and metal products. The company also offers office supplies, paper and paper products, technology and peripherals, hobbies and crafts, furniture, food, and cleaning products. The company was formerly known as American Israeli Paper Mills Ltd. and changed its name to Hadera Paper Ltd. in July 2008. Hadera Paper Ltd. was founded in 1951 and is based in Hadera, Israel.

HOD.TA.summary: Hod Assaf Industries Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells steel bars for construction, welded meshes for concrete reinforcement, and galvanized and drawn wires in Israel and Romania. The company offers products, such as steel for construction, processed steel for construction, assembled and welded elements, fences and concertinas, welded meshes for concrete reinforcement, and wires and auxiliary products. It also produces copper and aluminum wires and cables for electrical and control applications; supplies tools and equipment for construction; and manufactures galvanized and tensioned wires, barbed wires, nails, steel cables for cranes, mines, anchors, and other applications. In addition, the company is involved in processing and trading wood products for construction and communication industries. It serves customers in construction, infrastructure, security, and agricultural sectors and industries. The company was founded in 1947 and is based in Acre, Israel.

ICL.summary: ICL Group Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a specialty minerals and chemicals company worldwide. It operates in four segments: Industrial Products, Potash, Phosphate Solutions, and Innovative Ag Solutions (IAS). The Industrial Products segment produces bromine out of a solution that is a by-product of the potash production process, as well as bromine-based compounds; produces various grades of potash, salt, magnesium chloride, and magnesia products; and produces and markets phosphorous-based flame retardants and other phosphorus-based products. The Potash segment extracts potash from the Dead Sea; mines and produces potash and salt; produces Polysulphate; produces, markets, and sells magnesium and magnesium alloys, as well as related by-products, including chlorine and sylvinite; and sells salt. The Phosphate Solutions segment uses phosphate commodity products to produce specialty products; produces and markets phosphate-based fertilizers, as well as sulphuric acid, green phosphoric acid, and phosphate fertilizers; and manufactures thermal phosphoric acid for various industrial end markets, such as oral care, cleaning products, paints and coatings, water treatment, asphalt modification, construction, and metal treatment. It also develops and produces functional food ingredients and phosphate additives for use in the processed meat, poultry, seafood, dairy, beverage, and baked goods markets; and produces milk and whey proteins for the food ingredients industry. The IAS segment develops, manufactures, markets, and sells fertilizers based primarily on nitrogen, potash, and phosphate, including water soluble specialty, liquid, soluble, and controlled-release fertilizers. It sells its products through marketing companies, agents, and distributors. The company was formerly known as Israel Chemicals Ltd. and changed its name to ICL Group Ltd in May 2020. ICL Group Ltd was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

ICL.TA.summary: ICL Group Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a specialty minerals and chemicals company worldwide. It operates in four segments: Industrial Products, Potash, Phosphate Solutions, and Innovative Ag Solutions (IAS). The Industrial Products segment produces bromine out of a solution that is a by-product of the potash production process, as well as bromine-based compounds; produces various grades of potash, salt, magnesium chloride, and magnesia products; and produces and markets phosphorous-based flame retardants and other phosphorus-based products. The Potash segment extracts potash from the Dead Sea; mines and produces potash and salt; produces Polysulphate; produces, markets, and sells magnesium and magnesium alloys, as well as related by-products, including chlorine and sylvinite; and sells salt. The Phosphate Solutions segment uses phosphate commodity products to produce specialty products; produces and markets phosphate-based fertilizers, as well as sulphuric acid, green phosphoric acid, and phosphate fertilizers; and manufactures thermal phosphoric acid for various industrial end markets, such as oral care, cleaning products, paints and coatings, water treatment, asphalt modification, construction, and metal treatment. It also develops and produces functional food ingredients and phosphate additives for use in the processed meat, poultry, seafood, dairy, beverage, and baked goods markets; and produces milk and whey proteins for the food ingredients industry. The IAS segment develops, manufactures, markets, and sells fertilizers based primarily on nitrogen, potash, and phosphate, including water soluble specialty, liquid, soluble, and controlled-release fertilizers. It sells its products through marketing companies, agents, and distributors. The company was formerly known as Israel Chemicals Ltd. and changed its name to ICL Group Ltd in May 2020. ICL Group Ltd was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.

ILCO.TA.summary: Israel Corporation Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the specialty minerals and chemicals, and refining and petrochemicals businesses in Europe, Asia, North America, South America, and internationally. The company offers bromine and bromine-based compounds; magnesia, calcium carbonate, and salt products; phosphorous-based products; potash, salt, polysulphate, and magnesium; phosphate rock and fertilizer-grade phosphoric acid; phosphate-based fertilizers; sulphuric and green phosphoric acids; and controlled release fertilizers, water soluble fertilizers, liquid fertilizers, and straights. It also provides bromine-based and phosphorus-based flame retardants; elemental bromine; clear brine fluids; industrial brominated biocides; inorganic bromides; phosphorus-based industrial compounds; MgCl2; and technical grade KCl products. In addition, the company produces fuel products; raw materials for the petrochemical industry; and materials for the plastics industry, as well as provides power and water, including steam services to various industries in Haifa. Its products are primarily used in the areas of agriculture, electronics, food, fuel and gas exploration, water purification and desalination, detergents, cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, and automotive. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

INRM.TA.summary: Inrom Construction Industries Ltd produces, markets, and sells various products and solutions for the construction and renovation industries in Israel. It offers flooring, and environment and landscape development products, such as interlocking stones, curbstones, steps and dimples, terrazzo tiles, and various claddings; and concrete plants, including underground infrastructure products. The company also manufactures and markets construction adhesive products comprising cement adhesives for gluing tiles, various cladding surfaces for interior and exterior design, colored guns, mortar products for flooring, and others; plaster products, shlichat and shtetl products, special cement products, and additives for various construction projects; and sealants, coatings, and bonding materials. In addition, it provides construction paint products for interior and exterior works, decorative colors for special designs, and various coatings; electrostatic powder paints for metal products and other materials; industrial paints, including wet paint and primer products for coating concrete floors and industrial designation. The company serves entrepreneurs, contractors, self-builders, architects, interior designers, building inspectors, and professionals in construction-related sectors. Inrom Construction Industries Ltd was founded in 2013 and is based in Airport City, Israel.

KAFR.TA.summary: Kafrit Industries (1993) Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells customized masterbatches and compounds for the plastic industry worldwide. The company offers masterbatches and compounds for polycarbonate and PMMA sheets, halogen free solutions for sheets and pipes, agricultural films, polyethylene packaging polypropylene cast and calender films, and blowing agents. It also provides CONSTAB and CONPEEL compounds, injection/blow moldings, and antioxidants; Ecocell, a revolutionary foaming agent to reduce material and resin consumption; BOPE, a sustainable solution for flexible packaging films; and antimony free/reduced antimony FR solutions. The company offers its products for various applications, such as packaging films, including BOPP, CPP, and PE, as well as PC sheet, agricultural derivatives, biopolymers, flame retardant, PEX pipes, fibers, and nonwovens. Kafrit Industries (1993) Ltd was founded in 1973 and is based in Sha'ar HaNegev, Israel.

KLIL.TA.summary: Klil Industries Ltd designs, develops, manufactures, and markets aluminum systems for the building and industry sectors in Israel and internationally. It offers sliding and hinges windows; balcony and interior doors, as well as front entrances; rolling shutter systems; and curtain walls, coatings and colors, industry profiles, and window accessories. The company was founded in 1950 and is based in Karmiel, Israel.

MNIN.TA.summary: Mendelson Infrastructures & Industries Ltd. engages in the marketing and supply of fluid conveyance equipment in Israel. It offers pipes and piping accessories comprising multi-layer piping, PEX piping, copper piping, polyroll piping, multigol piping, and accessories; and fire extinguishing products, including sprinklers and alarm check valves, grooved butterfly and check valves , flow sensors, test and drain valves, galvanized grooved connectors, hanging accessories, gate valves, fire-extinguishing cannons, double-winged check valves, and fire-extinguishing pumps. The company also provides industrial products, which include gates, valves, low and high pressure piping and accessories, pneumatic and electric adapter, and command and control systems; infrastructure products comprising wedge valves, check valves, filters, butterfly valves, flanges, piping accessories, adapters, knife valves, and check adapters. In addition, it also offers sanitation products comprising toilet bowls, bathroom sinks, kitchen sinks and taps, shower taps, concealed cisterns, visible cisterns, bathroom cabinets, bathroom accessories, and shower stalls; and offers various pumping products. The company is based in Kiryat Ata, Israel.

NALA.TA.summary: Nala Digital Commerce Ltd, a multi-commodity gemstone mining exploration company, explores for, develops, and produces gemstones projects in Northern Israel. The company primarily explores for diamond, moissanite, corundum, ruby, garnet, hibonite, spinel, ilmenite, and sapphire, as well as zircon and rutile. Its flagship projects include the Mount Carmel and Kishon River Mid-Reach projects. The company was formerly known as Shefa Yamim Ltd and changed its name to Nala Digital Commerce Ltd in November 2020. Nala Digital Commerce Ltd was founded in 1999 and is based in Acre, Israel.

POLP.TA.summary: Polyram Plastic Industries LTD manufactures and supplies thermoplastic compounds. Its products include engineering plastics; functional polymers, including coupling agents, compatibilizers, impact modifiers, and adhesive resins for applications in automotive, multi-layer film, industrial, and packaging; polytron materials, which are primarily used in automotive sector; and purging agents. The company offers its products through distributors in Israel and internationally. Polyram Plastic Industries LTD was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Moshav Ram-On, Israel.

PTCH.TA.summary: Israel Petrochemical Enterprises Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the petrochemicals industry worldwide. The company is involved in processing of crude oil and provision of various petroleum products, such as gasoline, naphtha, diesel, kerosene, fuel oil, and bitumen. It also manufactures raw materials for the plastic industry comprising polypropylene and polyethylene. In addition, the company manufactures aromatic substances, which include benzene, paraxylene, orthoxylene, and toluene that are used as ingredients in the manufacture of other products. Further, it provides basic oils and waxes, as well as leases tankers to transport fuel products. The company serves fuel and gas marketing companies, industries, gas stations. Israel Petrochemical Enterprises Ltd. sells its products through agents and distributors. The company was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel. Israel Petrochemical Enterprises Ltd. is a subsidiary of Alverstone Ltd.

PVNNF.summary: P.V. Nano Cell Ltd. engages in developing, manufacturing, marketing, and commercializing conductive inks for digital inkjet conductive printing applications. The company develops the Sicrys family of single crystal nano-metric conductive inks; and silver-based Sicrys inks for printed electronics (PE) applications, including photovoltaic devices, printed passive components, circuit boards, mobile phone antennas, 3D printed electronic devices, radio-frequency identification chips, sensors and touchscreens, and other digital PE, as well as printing of windshields in automotive. It also offers copper-based nano-metric inks for mass-production of PE. In addition, the company manufactures printing machines, which offer solutions for inkjet print-quality technologies. It operates in Israel, Germany, France, Holland, Austria, the United States, and internationally. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Migdal Ha'Emek, Israel.

RIMO.TA.summary: Rimoni Industries Ltd. engages in the design, engineering, and manufacturing of molds, and precise injection molding and assemblies for the medical, automotive, agricultural, high-tech, and consumer industries in Israel. It offers hardened steel molds, including multi-cavity molds, molds with hot runner systems, prototype molds for complex and intricate products, molds for micro-precision parts, over-moldings, and others. The company also provides precision plastic parts by thermoplastic injection molding; and assembly services for injection molding products. Rimoni Industries Ltd. was founded in 1954 and is based in Modi'in-Maccabim-Re'ut, Israel.

RMN.TA.summary: Ram-On Investments and Holdings (1999) Ltd develops, manufactures, and markets engineering thermoplastic compounds. The company provides adhesives and enhancers. It also engages in the building rental business. It primarily serves irrigation, automotive, electrical appliances, and electronic accessories industries in Israel, the United States, and Europe. The company was formerly known as Poliram (1999) Ltd and changed its name to Ram-On Investments and Holdings (1999) Ltd in September 2015. Ram-On Investments and Holdings (1999) Ltd was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Gilboa, Israel.

SAFO.summary: Save Foods, Inc. develops and sells eco-friendly green solutions to enhance food safety and shelf life of fresh fruits and vegetables. Its products include SavePROTECT or PeroStar, a processing aids used in post-harvest treatment added to fruit and vegetable wash water; and SF3HS and SF3H, a post-harvest cleaning and sanitizing solution to control both plant and foodborne pathogens. The company also offers SpuDefender product for controlling post-harvest potato sprouts; and FreshProtect product for controlling spoilage microorganisms on post-harvest citrus. Its products are based on proprietary blend of food acids combined with an oxidizer, and is capable of cleaning, sanitizing, and controlling pathogens on fresh produce safer for human consumption or which lead to various forms of decay in fruit and vegetable. Save Foods, Inc. was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Lower Galilee, Israel.

SEFA.L.summary: Shefa Gems Ltd operates as a precious stone exploration company in northern Israel. The company explores for diamonds, natural moissanites, sapphires, rubies, garnets, hibonites, spinels, and ilmenites, as well as gold deposits; and heavy minerals, including zircon and rutile. It has interests in exploration and prospecting permits in the Kishon River catchment area of Haifa and Mount Carmel that covers a total area of approximately 614 square kilometers. The company was formerly known as Shefa Yamim (A.T.M.) Ltd. and changed its name to Shefa Gems Ltd in June 2019. Shefa Gems Ltd was founded in 1999 and is based in Netanya, Israel.

SHAN.TA.summary: Shaniv Paper Industry Ltd develops, manufactures, and markets paper products in Israel and internationally. It offers toilet paper, paper towels, tissue paper, and paper napkins, as well as a line of products for rolling for the institutional market. household, automotive, personal care, institutional, and industrial. The company also provides detergents; bleach products; products for cleaning and handling various surfaces; pesticide products for household use; laundry and perfume products; complementary products for cleaning and maintenance of the house, such as cloths, scrubbing pillows, nylon bags, kitchen auxiliary products, and disposable products; and soaps and toiletries, hair and skin care products, sun blocking products, deodorants, and shaving gels under the Touch and Lovely brand names. In addition, it offers automotive and industry maintenance and servicing products, including urea additives; oils and greases; cooling system liquids; maintenance sprays; vehicle care products; grease removers; professional washing preparations; and hand cleaning and hygiene products under the MAXOL-MAX name. The company's products are used in various sectors, such as household, automotive, personal care, institutional, and industrial sectors. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Ofakim, Israel.
